item.title: MCP: Technical Detail or Revolutionary Framework?
item.description: A deep dive into Anthropic's Model Context Protocol (MCP), exploring whether this new standard for connecting AI models with external data sources represents an incremental improvement or a fundamental paradigm shift in AI development.
